message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you.  I'm asking for $20,000 to start negotiations. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm a bit concerned about the price. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider this price?
I understand your position, Bob, but $10,000 is significantly below its value. This product offers unique advantages. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?
I appreciate the offer, but I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $13,500. Would you be willing to consider this price?
